sentences: Ta soovib saada arstiks ja see on tema eesmärk suureks saada.
Lapsed otsivad alati midagi uut, mida saaksid suureks teha.
context: 'Suureks' is the illative form of 'suur,' meaning 'into big.' It is commonly used to describe something growing or becoming large, such as a child growing up or achieving a goal that requires becoming more significant in some way.
